==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しゃ|ちく|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
The term was conceived by Japanese novelist and chairman of Japan Supermarket Association, Satoshi Azuchi, and continued by Japanese journalist Makoto Sataka.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゃちく}}

# An [[employee]] who is completely [[controlled]] by his [[company]], not complaining for overwork or anything.
